alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Laurens, east central Wilkinson, south central Washington and northwestern Johnson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tuckers Crossroad, or 10 miles west of Wrightsville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Wrightsville, Harrison, Lovett, Spann, Donovan, Tuckers Crossroad, Brewton and Pringle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
